comments.author: jimmyhate
comments.body: So, I gotta ask, is there any particular reason you're trying to pass off screenshots of Cyberpunk 2077 as your own game on the website. or did you just think no one would notice?Also, it's a little chintzy to just grab random wallpapers and put your logo on it instead of actually paying to have some bespoke stuff done, isn't it? Doesn't exactly scream that you have any investment in this beyond a pump and dump, does it?
